Highlights in Jazz #17: Salute to Swing! The Music of Ellington, Goodman, Basie and others - Joe Newman, Zoot Sims, Phil Bodner, Bucky Pizzarelli, George Duvivier, Panama Francis, Hank Jones, Maxine Sullivan, David Lee (Tape 1 of 2)

Highlights in Jazz #17: Salute to Swing! The Music of Ellington, Goodman, Basie and others - Joe Newman, Zoot Sims, Phil Bodner, Bucky Pizzarelli, George Duvivier, Panama Francis, Hank Jones, Maxine Sullivan, David Lee (Tape 1 of 2)

Original format: 1/2 inch open reel video; Transfer Technician Notes: "As with other tapes in this collection, there is an inherent constant sync error that is stabilized by time base correction, but ultimately results in moderate to severe flagging throughout. This flagging is generally above the performers, but intensifies in low lighting. Mild image jitter throughout. Elsewhere, there are frequent mild dropouts, and occasional tape damage and head clogs. Occasional inherent exposure adjustments and mild ghosting. Luma is adjusted to mitigate clipping from glare. Audio distortion is inherent to the original recording."
